DOC.brief_summary: Aim study ass effect abruptly increase afterload leave ventricular contractility relaxation patient heart failure preserve ejection fraction ( HFPEF ) , patient heart failure reduce ejection fraction ( HFREF ) , patient without HFPEF HFREF .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Acutely Elevated Afterload Left Ventricular Contractility Relaxation
DOC.criteria: Clinical indication leave right heart catheterization HFPEF ( Group 1 ) OR HFREF ( Group 2 ) OR absent echocardiographic evidence HFREF OR HFPEF ( Group 3 ) AND Sinus rhythm invasive measurement Age ≥18 year Negative pregnancy test woman childbearing potential Written inform consent Acute coronary syndrome Acute myocardial infarction < 6 month Planned cardiac surgery cardiovascular intervention within 6 month follow inclusion Valvular heart disease > 2° Severe comorbidities limit life expectancy < 12 month Precapillary pulmonary hypertension Participation another trial
